message.body: I need to know I ur coming Xmas?
Wow that's crazy! I was just thinking about you guys and Christmas and you texted me the same exact time! I could. Are you going away or anything?
No I'm not going awAy. Ill b home. What u plan on doing?
What do you mean? Was not really coming up with the real plan. What were you thinking?
A big Xmas dinner with the family
I really want you guys to meet Danielle.
Yeah pretty much but u gotta stick around for dinner this time. Ur welcome to bring her or we can come up one weekend n hang out
Yeah, I won't ride my motorcycle this time so I don't have to go home early.
